label: Vitamins in Human Body
summary: Essential micronutrients for normal body functions
details: Vitamins are organic compounds required in small quantities for growth, metabolism, immunity, and cellular repair.

children.label: Vitamin Classification
children.details: Vitamins are classified as fat-soluble or water-soluble.

children.label: Fat-Soluble Vitamins
children.details: Includes Vitamins A, D, E, and K.

children.label: Water-Soluble Vitamins
children.details: Includes Vitamin C and B-complex vitamins.

children.label: Dietary Sources
children.details: Fruits, vegetables, dairy, grains, and meats provide vitamins.
